biotools.summary: MolProbity is a structure validation web service for diagnosing problems in 3D models of proteins, nucleic acids or complexes.  It adds and optimizes H atoms (correcting 180° flipped Asn/Gln/His sidechains), and then calculates global and local validation for all-atom contacts (steric clashes, H-bonds & vdW), covalent geometry, and conformation (Ramachandran & rotamers for protein, ribose puckers & suite conformers for RNA).  Results are displayed online as 3D graphics and sortable charts.

bioschemas.name: MolProbity
